constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 109 (Wednesday, June 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. WATERS:
H.R. 4111.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 3 provides Congress with the
power to ``regulate commerce with foreign nations, and among
the several states, and with the Indian tribes.''
[Page H3083]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: Sovereign Debt Contract Capacity Act
